name: cfml-formatter
description: CFML Formatting and language server for VSCode
author: Mark Drew

cfml-formatter.javaPath.description: The path to the java executable to run the Language Server

cfml-formatter.defaultConfig.description: The path to a default config file to if one is not defined in the workspace

cfml-formatter.startLuceeServer.description: Set to false if you are running a LSP server already, only used for debugging the extension itself.

cfml-formatter.lspPort.description: The port to run the LSP server on. This is what the extension will connect to. Each editor will have its own LSP server.

cfml-formatter.serverPort.description: The port to run the Lucee server on. Used to debug the extension itself. Each editor will have its own Lucee server.

commands.title: CFML Formatter: Open Server URL (for debugging)

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run compile && cd server && ant
